title: My old pixel 3a and now my brand new pixel 4a will not show incoming call pop-up.
content:
Check that the Phone app has all notifications enabled
Settings -> Apps & notifications - > See all apps 
Navigate down to find the ‘Phone’ app
Select ‘Notifications’
Tap on ‘Incoming Calls’ and make sure the ‘Pop on screen’ option is turned on
The pop screen section is grayed out in the off position. Very frustrated
